statements: SELECT * FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM BusRoutes;
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_description FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_description FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM BusRoutes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT stop_name, lat, lng FROM bus_stops ORDER BY stop_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE start_stop_id = 100 AND end_stop_id = 200;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes;
SELECT * FROM bus_stops WHERE lat > 40;
SELECT stop_name, lat, lng FROM bus_stops ORDER BY lat DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM bus_routes WHERE start_stop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM bus_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM bus_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_stop, end_stop FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT stop_name, location FROM bus_stops WHERE location = 'Downtown';
SELECT schedule_id, route_id, stop_id, departure_time FROM bus_schedules WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name='Express Route'
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM bus_routes WHERE start_stop='Central Station' ORDER BY route_id DESC
SELECT route_name, start_stop, end_stop FROM bus_routes ORDER BY route_name ASC, start_stop DESC
SELECT bs.stop_name, bs.location, bss.departure_time, bss.arrival_time FROM bus_stops bs JOIN bus_schedules bss ON bs.stop_id = bss.stop_id WHERE bss.route_id=3 ORDER BY bss.departure_time ASC
SELECT br.route_name, bs.stop_name, bss.frequency FROM bus_routes br JOIN bus_stops bs ON br.route_id = bss.route_id JOIN bus_schedules bss ON bs.stop_id = bss.stop_id WHERE bs.location='Downtown'
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT stop_id, stop_name FROM stops WHERE stop_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 3 AND arrival_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT stop_name, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 5 AND arrival_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT route_name, stop_name FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE schedules.route_id = 3 AND schedules.stop_id = 2 ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id FROM routes WHERE end_stop_id = 5;
SELECT stop_name FROM stops ORDER BY stop_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id, day_of_week FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT route_id, stop_name FROM stops JOIN stops_routes ON stops.stop_id = stops_routes.stop_id WHERE position = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_stop_id, end_stop_id FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM stops WHERE stop_type = 'bus_stop';
SELECT schedule_id, routes.route_name, day_of_week, departure_time FROM schedules JOIN routes ON schedules.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT stops.stop_name, stops.stop_location, routes.route_name FROM stops JOIN stops_routes ON stops.stop_id = stops_routes.stop_id JOIN routes ON stops_routes.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(*) AS stops_count FROM routes JOIN stops_routes ON routes.route_id = stops_routes.route_id GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY stops_count DESC;
